channel.title: The Brindlewood Bay Kickstarter Campaign Ends Tomorrow!
channel.description:
Hello! The Kickstarter campaign for my game Brindlewood Bay is ending tomorrow night! We have had a very successful campaign so far—over 4000% funded, 20 stretch goals unlocked, and a brand new Roll20 Companion reward added. It would help us out a lot if you would take a look at the campaign and consider pledging!
https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/gauntlet/brindlewood-bay-cozy-murder-mystery-rpg
